DOC.brief_summary: The study is designed to demonstrate that axitinib plus best supportive care is superior to placebo plus best supportive care in prolonging survival in patients with advanced hepatocellular carcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: Axitinib For The Treatment Of Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Locally advanced or metastatic HCC Failure of one prior antiangiogenic therapy including sorafenib, bevacizumab and brivanib. ChildPugh Class A or B (score 7 only) disease. Prior treatment of advanced HCC with more than one prior firstline systemic therapy. Any prior local therapy within 2 weeks of starting the study treatment. Presence of hepatic encephalopathy and/or clinically relevant ascites. Presence of main portal vein invasion by HCC.
